section.p: The reportable malignancy of the patient's cancer.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] CancerNumber with data type Code
Indicates the reportable malignancy associated with this patient's PREVIOUS HISTORY OF CANCER.ICDO. Possible values are ICDO-3 TOPOGRAPHY CODES

Contains exactly one [1..1] CancerNumber with data type Code
Indicates the reportable malignancy associated with this patient's PREVIOUS HISTORY OF CANCER.ICDO. Possible values are ICDO-3 TOPOGRAPHY CODES
